product_name: Big Agnes Mad House 4 Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for 3-season camping fun with the whole family, the Big Agnes Mad House 4 Tent features 2 easy-access doors, lofty headroom and spacious vestibules for storage. Sleeves and plastic clips attach tent body to the pole frame quickly and easily. Fly is made of lightweight ripstop polyester with a polyurethane coating for waterproofness; stormflaps on vestibule doors keep the weather outside where it belongs. Floor is made from ripstop polyester with a hardy waterproof polyurethane coating; using the corresponding footprint (not included) protects floor from wear and tear. Mesh doors, windows and ceiling offer excellent cross-ventilation. All seams are factory taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs). Aluminum poles with Pressfit(R) connectors deliver lightweight strength and durability. Includes stuff sacks, 12 lightweight aluminum hook stakes, reflective guyline and ceiling accessory loops. Closeout.
short_description: Built for 3-season camping fun with the whole family, the Big Agnes Mad House 4 Tent features 2 easy-access doors, lofty headroom and spacious vestibules for storage.
